@Saladman I don't think it's bad writting that the father didn't lash out. You have to realize he's a Japanese Salary man, they're known to take a lot of shit without complaining and they don't see their families often. He also said he knew about it before hand and if you consider that he loves both his wife and son then I think it's plausible. (Not that I would've done the same) I think he's a good father and husdband and did his duty so he expects his son to do the same. In the real world bad shit happens to good people, so I don't think this is bad writting. What the fuck is this vanilla bullshit? I mean, I'm not saying I don't like wholesome, but this was just some really bad writing. That's it, he moves away but still is doing the same thing except he's not in the house.

That dad is the cuck of all cucks, like what the fuck. I read this in anticipation of some well written drama but then suddenly "hey son, its ok that you fucked my wife.
